home.subtitle: I'm a fullstack web developer who solves a wide range of problems.

studies.title: Studies
studies.text: Page used to apply knowledge related to various areas focused on software development in practice

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
description: I developed REST APIs using technologies: C#, SQL Server, Docker e Entity Framework.
I developed web applications using technologies: React.js, Typescript e, Docker.
I woked on modernization of legacy software.

jobs.title: Co-Founder & CTO & Full Stack Developer (remote)
description: I worked on all the demands related to the development of systems, from the gathering of requirements to the implementation of web solutions..
I designed and developed GraphQL and REST APIs using technologies: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Postgres, Prisma, GraphQL, Typescript.
I developed web applications using technologies: React.js, Nuxt, Typescript.
I set up project infrastructure on Google Cloud.
I created Continuous Integration pipelines on Google Cloud Build.
I created a page for admins using Retool (low code).

jobs.title: Backend developer (remote)
description: Assisted in the development and maintenance of GraphQL and REST APIs using microservice frameworks with Apollo Federation.
I worked with technologies: Node.js, Typescript, GraphQL, MySQL, Firestore, MongoDB, ElasticSearch and Redis.
Developed unit tests and bug fixes to improve software quality and performance.
Participated in code reviews to ensure adherence to coding best practices and standards.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer (remote)
description: Participated in activities related to the development of various websites, such as: requirements analysis, data modeling, website development, testing and maintenance.
I worked with technologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, CodeIgniter, SQL, jQuery.

bio.title: Bio
bio.text: Hello there! My name is Felipe Antônio Miotto, I'm guy a little disconnected from social media but very focused on the world of technology. I'm a web solutions developer from Brazil, who solves the most diverse problems. I really like music, making music and spending quality time with my family and in contact with nature. I am very curious and always seek to improve my technical and personal skills.
